entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
